definition: Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Is Medvedev the lapdog of Putin?
sentences.chinese: 梅德韦德夫是普京的小宠物吗？

sentences.english: Why on the Wedd body has Jordan's shadow?
sentences.chinese: 为什么韦德身上有乔丹的影子？

sentences.english: By the time Vedder learned the truth, Severson had died of multiple sclerosis .
sentences.chinese: 韦德的时候学到的真理，塞夫森死于多发性硬化症。

sentences.english: The Miami Heat have Dwyane Wade and Mario Chalmers.
sentences.chinese: 迈阿密热火韦德和马里奥查默斯。

sentences.english: "I understand why LeBron said it," Wade said.
sentences.chinese: “我理解为什么勒布朗这么说，”韦德说。

sentences.english: But during Miami’s 83-80 Game 5 win over Chicago, the training staff was attending to Wade’s shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 但在与公牛的第五场比赛中，韦德的肩部带着护具。

sentences.english: Wade had difficulty pulling together enough money to send his children to school.
sentences.chinese: 韦德很难凑集足够的钱让孩子们去上学。

sentences.english: The way Wade played last season, he can't be pigeonholed into one position.
sentences.chinese: 就拿韦德上赛季的表现，他不能被固定只打一个位置。

sentences.english: And the guppy raced after him.
sentences.chinese: 这只孔雀鱼在韦德后面追着。

sentences.english: Wade, meanwhile, is still a mediocre jump shooter.
sentences.chinese: 而韦德仍然是一个中距离跳投手。

sentences.english: Salim pulls out his gun and shoots Javed.
sentences.chinese: 萨利姆拿出他的枪和竹笋贾韦德。

sentences.english: They weren't even sure about D-Wade yet.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至连韦德的去向都不确定。

sentences.english: Javed's men then come in and shoot Salim multiple times.
sentences.chinese: 贾韦德的男子然后在拍摄萨利姆多次。

sentences.english: Wade walked quickly to the refrigerator and pulled out another beer.
sentences.chinese: 韦德快步走到冰箱边又拿出一罐啤酒。

sentences.english: "They like having me around, " Wade said.

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Carter (name)/James Earl (Jimmy) Carter (1924-), US Democrat politician, president 1977-1981
Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
